oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Words and Music Night - 2012-04-24
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Words and Music Night program held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 24, 2012. Professional songwriters with student co-writers performing songs they have written together during the course of the school year. Hosted by
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Diamond Rio;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: "Performances include; When I Go To Middle School (Bob Spanburgh with Taylor Griggs); Leaving London (Sandy Ramos with Gaby Viner); Pretzel Pete (Mark Johnson with Amalia Estrada); Strong (Jason Duke with Sophie Bailey); I’m A Boy (Joel Atkins with Sims Lance); You And Me (Tim Buppert with Engy Aziz); Island Time (Christy McDonald and Erick Hedrick with Emma Farley); Dreams (Tammy Vice with Gracie Fleser, Addy Mitchell, and Kaitlyn Sneed); Thankful (Les Kerr with Jenna DeRivera); That’s A Noun (Simon McCain with Ladarionta Burnley); Barn Rat (Jerry Vandiver with Zoe Smith); I Love Food (Bob Howard with Gisele Campos and Isabella Nunez); Can’t Stop Loving You (Misty Rae with Whitney Brown and Anna Wright); A Baker’s Gift (Gary Michael Smith with Lily Unick); I Hate Homework (Shane Adams with Austin Ayres); One More Day (Diamond Rio);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Diamond Rio (Musical group); Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
